thread.title: Trump promises to build border wall ahead of schedule. What schedule?
thread.title_full: Trump promises to build border wall ahead of schedule. What schedule?

author: Ben Mathis-Lilley
title: Trump promises to build border wall ahead of schedule. What schedule?
text:
Your News Companion Feb. 28 2017 10:48 PM Trump Promises to Start Border Wall "Ahead of Schedule" Despite Being the Guy Responsible for Setting Its Schedule Mike Pence, Paul Ryan, and Donald Trump at the Capitol on Tuesday night. Jim Lo Scalzo/Pool/Getty Images 
President Donald Trump gave a speech Tuesday night to a joint session of Congress. He promised to do a lot of stuff, but one line in particular stood out: We will soon begin the construction of a great wall along our southern border. It will be started ahead of schedule and, when finished, it will be a very effective weapon against drugs and crime. Advertisement 
What schedule? There is no schedule. No one has set a schedule, and since this is Trump's big plan, he would be the one to set it. How can you start something ahead of a schedule that doesn't exist? 
In other news, this post came in well under budget! 
Ben Mathis-Lilley edits the Slatest. Follow @Slatest on Twitter . Load Comments
